title.content-text: 4.2.4 - Securing Remote Administrative Access to Routers

brief.content-text: The diagram depicts controlling remote administrative access with SSH. The topology is the same as 4.2.4 Diagram One, except that a pipe labeled Secure Tunnel passes from the Administrative Host on the LAN through switch S1 and router R1 to router R2. The Administrative Host text is: Host is an SSH client. The router R2 text is: SSH Server and client.
